title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
**Product Title:**
Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers â€“ Science & Engineering Kit

**Product Description:**
Discover the fascinating world of structural engineering with the award-winning Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit! Perfect for young engineers with an intermediate skill level, this kit has earned the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award for its educational value and engaging design. 

Dive into the blueprints of engineering with 285 high-quality pieces to construct 20 different models that teach the fundamental principles of structural design. Each model represents a unique type of bridge or skyscraper, offering a hands-on learning experience about the forces that affect these structures.

**Features:**

- **Models to Build:** A diverse set of 20 models, including various bridge types like truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges.
- **Piece Count:** A robust collection of 285 pieces allows for a multifaceted exploration of engineering concepts.
- **Learning Concepts:** Explore key principles such as force, load, compression, tension, mechanical physics, and structural engineering.
- **Skill Level:** Designed for intermediate-level enthusiasts, ensuring a challenging yet manageable learning curve.
- **Color:** A sleek blue color scheme that adds a touch of style to your engineering creations.
- **Award-Winning:** Recognized with the Parents' Choice Gold Award, guaranteeing an exceptional educational experience.
- **Structural Elements:** Learn about columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary forms.
- **Forces Explored:** Understand the impact of tension, compression, shear, and bending on structures.
- **Manual Pages:** A comprehensive 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide provide clear instructions and educational content.
- **Experiments:** Engage in a series of 20 model-building experiments that illuminate the strength and stability of structures, as well as the strength and stiffness of materials.
- **Optimization Learning:** Discover how to optimize structures for safety and cost, a crucial aspect of real-world engineering.

This Thames & Kosmos kit not only sparks creativity but also instills a deep understanding of the science behind some of the most iconic architectural wonders. Whether for educational purposes or as a hobby, this Structural Engineering kit is sure to provide hours of constructive fun and learning.

**Box Contents:**
- 285 Construction Pieces
- Illustrated Experiment Manual and Assembly Guide (36 pages)
- 20 Model Design Blueprints

Empower your child with the tools to build a stronger future in science and engineering with Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers. Order now and take the first step into the world of architectural marvels!

**Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit**

Unleash the aspiring engineer within with the award-winning *Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers* kit! This captivating blue-colored construction set, a proud recipient of the Parents' Choice Gold Award, is the perfect blend of education and fun for intermediate-level builders.

**Key Features:**

- **Build, Learn, and Experiment:** With 20 different model-building experiments, each one designed to teach mechanical physics and structural engineering principles, this kit is a hands-on educational toy that will keep budding engineers engaged for hours.
- **Award-Winning Quality:** This kit has been recognized for its exceptional educational value and engaging nature, earning the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award.
- **Extensive Manual:** A detailed 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide is included to lead young engineers through each experiment, ensuring a clear understanding of the concepts.
- **285 Piece Set:** With 285 pieces, this kit allows the construction of various structural elements such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary systems.
- **Discover Forces and Engineering Concepts:** Explore critical learning concepts such as force, load, compression, tension, mechanical physics, and the strength and stability of structures. Understand the importance of optimizing for safety and cost in engineering.
- **Multiple Bridge Types:** Learn about different types of bridges by constructing models of truss bridges, arch bridges, cantilever bridges, rope bridges, and suspension bridges.
- **Skill Level:** Designed for intermediate-level builders, this kit challenges and educates young minds in a fun and interactive way.

Whether for a curious child or a classroom setting, the *Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers* kit is an excellent tool for learning the fundamentals of structural engineering and the physics of strength and stiffness in materials. Gift the joy of learning and the thrill of building to the young engineer in your life today!

Title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers - Science & Engineering Kit

Description:
Unleash the budding engineer within your child with the award-winning Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit! The kit includes a variety of structural elements such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary curves, enabling a hands-on understanding of the real-world applications of these components.

Learning Concepts:
Dive into the world of mechanical physics and structural engineering with comprehensive learning concepts that cover fundamental principles such as force, load, compression, tension, strength and stability of structures, and the optimization of designs for safety and cost. This kit not only teaches the theoretical aspects but also provides practical insights into the strength and stiffness of materials.

Bridge Types:
Explore the engineering behind different types of bridges as you construct models of a truss bridge, arch bridge, cantilever bridge, rope bridge, and suspension bridge. Each model serves as an experiment that demonstrates the forces at play - tension, compression, shear, and bending - and how they affect the strength and stability of bridges.

Instruction Manual:
The kit is accompanied by a 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide that walks you through each of the 20 model-building experiments. The step-by-step instructions ensure an educational yet enjoyable building process, perfect for an intermediate skill level.
